title: [BUG] SKGLView on MAUI (Android) is missing a handler
body:
SKGLView  in a MAUI project (.NET6 and .NET7) throws an exception about missing handler

The HostBuilderExtensions.cs (https://github.com/mono/SkiaSharp/tree/main/source/SkiaSharp.Views.Maui/SkiaSharp.Views.Maui.Controls)/AppHostBuilderExtensions.cs) only adds a handler for the SKCanvasView

		.ConfigureMauiHandlers(handlers =>
				{
					handlers.AddHandler<SKCanvasView, SKCanvasViewHandler>();
				})

A handler for the SKGLView is missing.

<!-- a general description goes here -->

<local:SKGLView PaintSurface="SKGLView_PaintSurface" />

<!-- a snippet of code that demonstrates the issue -->

A working OpenGL view.

<!-- a general description of what was the expected behavior or result -->

Exception: Microsoft.Maui.Platform.HandlerNotFoundException: 'Handler not found for view SkiaSharp.Views.Maui.Controls.SKGLView.'

<!-- a general description of what really happened -->

- Version with issue: latest (2.88.3) <!-- the version of SkiaSharp that has the issue -->
- Last known good version: unkown <!-- the version of SkiaSharp that still working -->
- IDE:  Visual Studio 17.4.3  <!-- Visual Studio / Visual Studio for Mac / MonoDevelop / Visual Studio Code -->
- Platform Target Frameworks: Android .NET6 / Android .NET7<!-- all that apply, remove the platforms that aren't broken or haven't had any testing -->
  - Android: 13.0<!-- the version of the Android SDK you are compiling against, e.g. 7.1 --> 
- Target Devices: Google Pixel 7 Pro, Emulator   <!-- the devices that you noticed this on, e.g. iPhone X -->
  - <!-- Google Pixel 4 XL -->
  - <!-- iPhone 11 -->
